casebody.data:
Robert Fuhs, Sr.
v.
Summer Fuhs, Constance C. Moore, and Legal Aid of North Carolina, Inc. No. 98P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016 Randolph M. James, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Fuhs, Robert (Sr.). T. Richard Kane, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Fuhs, Summer, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 21st of March 2016 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
